verbs.description: If [ARG0: President Donald Trump] , [ARGM-ADV: with his bully pulpit] , [ARGM-MNR: incessantly] [V: insists] [ARG1: a dog is a cat] , a troubling number of people will start to believe him .
If President Donald Trump , with his bully pulpit , incessantly insists [ARG1: a dog] [V: is] [ARG2: a cat] , a troubling number of people will start to believe him .
If President Donald Trump , with his bully pulpit , incessantly insists a dog is a cat , a troubling number of people [V: will] start to believe him .
[ARGM-ADV: If President Donald Trump , with his bully pulpit , incessantly insists a dog is a cat] , [ARG0: a troubling number of people] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: start] [ARG1: to believe him] .
If President Donald Trump , with his bully pulpit , incessantly insists a dog is a cat , [ARG0: a troubling number of people] will start to [V: believe] [ARG1: him] .
